response.overview: Hiroka and Rei are full of energy. Umi and Ai are bound by a strong friendship. The Owadas are on the verge of a falling apart family due to a mountain of problems such as infidelity and domestic violence. One day, tragedy suddenly befalls ordinary people. This is a story of "despair" and "hope" that wells up in each person's heart.
response.title: 夏前。終わり
